name: Evolution in two steps
description:
NOTE: There is a bug, so the submitted web version is not switching scenes correctly. If you lose, refresh to try again. If you win, refresh too. Or go directly to the patched resubmitted version at https://michelle2.itch.io/evolution-in-two-steps-now-for-real. Thanks to the organizers for allowing us to resubmit!

The game was developed for the Gamedev CUNI Jam 2022 by the Tripodiki team (Michelle2, LucikS, PSonicJ).

Theme: "The First Ever"

Description: You start as a cell in the ocean and your goal is to be the first ever to evolve to the next stage.

Controls:

  • W/S - for movement
  • Space - for eating (don't be afraid to spam the button :D)
